Class AbstractColorTransformer<Target>

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
LabelColorTransformerBuilder.LabelColorTransformer, RenderableColorTransformerBuilder.RenderableColorTransformer
public abstract class AbstractColorTransformer<Target>
extends AbstractTransformer<Target>

Color transformer. Uses a linear gradient to apply colors to objects.

Author:
Mathieu Bastian
